classRec.name: KeyLabels
classRec.description: Provides human readable labels for keys that can be looked up by keycode.

method.name: getLabel
method.description: Get a human readable label for the key with the assigned keyCode.
method.param: keyCode number assigned to keyboard key by flash, probably obtained from KeyboardEvent.keyCode
method.return: string label describing key represented by keyCode

classRec.name: KeypressFilter
classRec.description:
Provides ability to filter key events before game controls proxy sees them.

On some versions of linux flash player, there is a bug that causes press-and-hold to be interpreted as many clicks.

The pattern is release-press pairs being issued on the same frame; a sequence unlikely to be performed by any mere mortal. So here we accumulate events that occur in between frames, filter out duplicates, and pass on the uniques.

method.name: KeypressFilter
method.description: Constructor.

classRec.name: KeyboardGameControlsProxy
classRec.description:
An implementation of IGameControlsProxy for keyboards.

Maps keyboard events to JoyHat and JoyButton events.

Keys can be customized via setKeys() and queried via joystickGetHatKey() and joystickGetButtonKey()

method.name: KeyboardGameControlsProxy
method.description: Constructor

method.name: joystickGetButtonKey
method.description: Retrieves the key code currently assigned to trigger the given button.
method.param: button A KeyboardGameControlsProxy constant (BTN_) representing the button to get the keycode value for.
method.paramjoystick: A reference to the IJoystick to get the keycode value from.

method.name: joystickGetHatKey
method.description: Retrieves the key code currently assigned to trigger the given hat direction.
method.param: joystick A reference to the IJoystick to get the keycode value from.
button A KeyboardGameControlsProxy constant (HAT_) representing the hat direction to get the keycode value for.

method.name: joystickKeysDefined
method.description: Determines whether keys have been defined for a specific joystick.
method.param: index A zero-based index selecting the joystick to check

method.name: setButtonKey
method.description: Provide custom key code assignment for a specific button.
method.param: playerIndex zero based index indicating which player joystick to set codes for.
button A KeyboardGameControlsProxy constant (BTN_) representing the button to get the keycode value for.
keyCode Keycode for button

method.name: setHatKey
method.description: Provide custom key code assignment for a specific hat direction.
method.param: playerIndex zero based index indicating which player joystick to set codes for.
hat A KeyboardGameControlsProxy constant (HAT_) representing the hat direction to get the keycode value for.
keyCode Keycode for hat direction

method.name: setKeys
method.description: Provide custom key code assignments for hat directions and buttons.
method.param: playerIndex zero based index indicating which player joystick to set codes for.
r Keycode for hat right
u Keycode for hat up
l Keycode for hat left
d Keycode for hat down
x Keycode for button X (yellow)
a Keycode for button A (red)
b Keycode for button B (blue)
c Keycode for button C (green)

field.name: BTN_A
field.description: Constant representing the red button (button A)

field.name: BTN_B
field.description: Constant representing the blue button (button B)

field.name: BTN_C
field.description: Constant representing the green button (button C)

field.name: BTN_X
field.description: Constant representing the yellow button (button X)

classRec.name: RC4D3GameControlsProxy
classRec.description:
An implementation of IGameControlsProxy for the R_C4D3 system.

Maps keyboard events to JoyHat and JoyButton events.

Keys initialize to the default R_C4D3 values, but can be customized via setKeys() and queried via joystickGetHatKey() and joystickGetButtonKey()

Uses hard-coded path from PathConstants to return to menu

method.name: RC4D3GameControlsProxy
method.description: Constructor

classRec.name: PathConstants
classRec.description:
The PathConstants utility class is an all-static class containing constants for working with paths in the R-C4D3 system.

You do not create instances of PathConstants; instead you refer to the static constants as PathConstants.RETURN_TO_MENU.

field.name: RETURN_TO_MENU
field.description: Defines the relative path from a game ROM to the menu front-end.

classRec.name: Version
classRec.description:
Provides information about the build that includes this code

Requires a compile-time definitions in the VERSION namespace; see example for details.
classRec.example:
The following code shows a sample compile-time definition for
specifiying the semver string (note the double quoting required for strings):
<listing version="3.0" >
-define+=VERSION::semver,"'0.0.0'"
</listing>

classRec.name: ConfigDataProxy
classRec.description:
ConfigDataProxy is a simple data structure front end to the romloader
xml configuration.

method.name: ConfigDataProxy
method.description: Constructor

method.name: toString
method.description: String print of current data

classRec.name: RomLoader
classRec.description:
Base rom loader implementation.

Loads a valid IGameRom SWF and provides access to an IGameConfigProxy, IGameControlsProxy, and an IGameScoresProxy.

Subclasses can overide the protected proxy creation methods to supply various implementations:

Configuration values are defined in a companion xml file that must live in the same folder as the DesktopRomLoaderForKeyboard SWF and be named romloader-config.xml (subclasses can override the configFile getter to expect a different position or get the url from flashVars). See ConfigDataProxy for the xml format expected.

Note: Due to the way HaXe inserts top-level classes when compiling a SWF, HaXe users must use the HaxeSideDoor to declare IGameRom compliance.

method.name: RomLoader
method.description: Constructor.

method.name: addVersionInfo
method.description: Adds version and copyright info to context menu

method.name: createConfigProxy
method.description:
Provides the game configuration proxy instance. Broken out for easy override.

This base implementation provides a ConfigDataProxy instance.

method.name: createControlsProxy
method.description:
Provides the game controls proxy instance.
Broken out for easy override.

method.name: createPreloader
method.description:
Provides the IPreloader instance to display during load.
Broken out for easy override.

method.name: createScoresProxy
method.description:
Provides the game scores proxy instance.
Broken out for easy override.

method.name: onIoError
method.description:
Triggered when an IOError occurs.
Writes the IOErrorEvent.toString() to the tracelog.

method.name: onSecurityError
method.description:
Triggered when an SecurityError occurs.
Writes the SecurityErrorEvent.toString() to the tracelog.

method.name: configUrl
method.description: Retrieves the url of the rom loader config file.

method.name: productVersion
method.description: Returns the application version string

field.name: header
field.defaultValue: Select a player's controls to modify.

classRec.name: ScoreEntry
classRec.description:
Value Object for storing scores associated with player data.
Designed for use with IGameScoreProxy implementors.

method.name: ScoreEntry
method.description: Constructor.
method.param: value Initial score value (optional)
value Initial player data (optional)

classRec.name: GameScoresProxy
classRec.description:
Base class for high score storage and retrieval.
  • Scores are kept in descending order (highest first)
  • Ties are allowed (same score, different initials), duplicates are not (first in wins)

method.name: GameScoresProxy
method.description: Constructor.
method.param:
id A unique identifier for this set of scores and initials.
Must be at least GAMEID_MIN characters long, but no longer than GAMEID_MAX.
capacity The total number of entries that may be stored (up to ENTRIES_MAX)

method.name: _insert
method.description:
Score insertion algorithm. Override for alternate implementations.

This implementation allows ties, but not duplicates, per the following rules:

  • S and I must match in length (let's call that L)
  • If L < max, the list is not yet full; candidate will always be allowed
  • If L == max, the list is full; candidate will only be allowed if the following are true:
    • the candidate score is >= the lowest score in the list
    • if the candidate score is equal to another score already in the list, the candidate initial must be different
  • When the candidate is added to a full list, the lowest score is removed
method.param: score Numeric score; candidate for insertion
initial String associated with score
S array of numeric scores
I array of string initials
max Upper limit for total number of scores and initials

method.name: load
method.description: Read the scores and initials from the storage medium. To be overridden by subclasses

method.name: store
method.description: Write the scores and initials to the storage medium. To be overridden by subclasses

method.name: toString
method.description:
Generates a displayable list of initials (up to 10 chars) and scores (up to 12 digits).

The character and digit limits are arbitrary for this toString implementation. Override this method to implement custom formats.

The following is a sample of the type of output toString produces:

1. Mr. Yellow : 999,999,999,999 2. Mr. Green : 1,234,567 3. Ms. Red : 89 4. Ms. Magent : 0

field.name: ENTRIES_MAX
field.description: Upper limit of number of entries allowed

field.name: GAMEID_MAX
field.description: Most number of characters a valid id may contain

field.name: GAMEID_MIN
field.description: Least number of characters a valid id may contain

classRec.name: LocalGameScoresProxy
classRec.description:
Extends the (abstract) GameScoresProxy base class to
store high scores and initials on the local hard drive, using a local SharedObject.

method.name: LocalGameScoresProxy
method.description: Constructor.
method.param: id A unique identifier for this set of scores and initials
capacity The total number of entries that may be stored (up to GameScoresProxy.ENTRIES_MAX)

method.name: load
method.description:
Retrieve the scores from local storage.

Dispatches com.pixeldroid.r_c4d3.scores.ScoreEvent.LOAD

method.name: store
method.description:
Submit the scores to local storage.

Dispatches com.pixeldroid.r_c4d3.scores.ScoreEvent.SAVE

classRec.name: RemoteGameScoresProxy
classRec.description:
Extends the (abstract) GameScoresProxy base class to store high scores and initials on a remote server, using a web service that accepts the following parameters:
  • game : String Unique game id
  • format : String "json" or "vrml"
  • data : String Score data--as json string--to store; omission or empty value for data triggers retrieval
and returns the following data:
  • type: String "get" or "set"
  • success : Boolean
  • message : String
  • data : String Score data as json string
Notes:
  • Requires com.adobe.serialization.json.JSON

method.name: RemoteGameScoresProxy
method.description: Constructor.
method.param: id A unique identifier for this set of scores and initials
accessUrl The storage webservice URL
capacity The total number of entries that may be stored (up to GameScoresProxy.ENTRIES_MAX)
isLogged Whether server messages should be trace logged

method.name: load
method.description:
Retrieve the scores from the server.

Dispatches com.pixeldroid.r_c4d3.scores.ScoreEvent.LOAD

method.name: store
method.description:
Submit the scores to the server.

Dispatches com.pixeldroid.r_c4d3.scores.ScoreEvent.SAVE

method.name: toJson
method.description: Generates a valid JSON representation of the high scores table.

method.name: remoteUrl
method.description: Provide the high score storage webservice URL.
method.param: value A URL to a webservice that supports game (string), format ('json') and data (string) query params

classRec.name: ContextMenuUtil
classRec.description: Provides utility methods for manipulating the context menu

method.name: addItem
method.description: Adds a context menu item and returns a reference to it, e.g. for adding event listeners.
method.param: owner The InteractiveObject instance whose context menu should be altered
label The menu item label
hideBuiltIn Whether to hide the suppressable built-in items. Not all built-in items can be hidden.

Event.name: CLOSE
Event.description:
Dispatched when the preloader is done,
typically after it has completed some outro transition in reponse to load progress reaching 100%.

Event.name: OPEN
Event.description: Dispatched when the preloader is ready to receive progress updates, typically after it has completed some intro transition in response to open().

classRec.name: JsonLoader
classRec.description:
Creates JSON formatted http requests, monitors the load progress of the response, and dispatches events for response success and failure. Notes:
  • Requires com.adobe.serialization.json.JSON

Event.name: error
Event.description: Dispatched when the data retreival process has failed.

Event.name: ready
Event.description: Dispatched when the data retreival process has completed.

method.name: JsonLoader
method.description: Constructor.
method.param: request An optional URLRequest to make immediately

method.name: load
method.description: Attempt to load the provided URLRequest
method.param: request URLRequest to make

method.name: bytesLoaded
method.description: Request the number of bytes loaded.

method.name: bytesTotal
method.description: Request the total number of bytes to load.

method.name: percent
method.description:
Request the load progress percent.
Results are (0 - 100).

classRec.name: DesktopRomLoader
classRec.description:
Loads a valid IGameRom SWF and provides it access to a keyboard game controls proxy and a local high scores proxy. Notes:
  • romloader-config.xml can declare the custom property fullScreen with boolean value true to launch game in fullscreen mode
  • Requires com.adobe.serialization.json.JSON

method.name: DesktopRomLoader
method.description:
Constructor.

Creates a rom loader designed for local play and scores storage.

classRec.name: WebRomLoader
classRec.description:
Loads a valid IGameRom SWF and provides it access to
a keyboard game controls proxy and a local high scores proxy.

method.name: WebRomLoader

Creates a rom loader designed for online play and local scores storage.
